bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to J. Martinez H., August 15, 1922

div1.p: Carter thanks Martinez for his information on the Book of Chilam Balam of Chumayel.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to J. Martinez H., August 15, 1922
div1.opener:
New Glasgow P. O.,
Amherst County, Va.,
August 15, 1922.
Dr. J. Martinez H.,
Calle 25, Numero 500,
Merida, Yucatan, Mexico.
My Dear Doctor Martinez:
div1.p:
Thank you very much for your very interesting and illuminating
letter of July 13th., which has just reached me here.

It is my purpose to go to Philadelphia when the weather turns
cooler, to examine the Book of Chilam Balam of Chumayel, but I
really think you have given me all the information extant on this
matter.

Please accept my most grateful thanks and believe me, with
highest personal regards.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Address:
Assistant Surgeon General H. R. Carter,
2121 California St., N. W.,
Washington, D. C.
